original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples, “Whoever wants to be my disciple must deny themselves and take up their cross and follow me.
korean_text: 이에 예수께서 제자들에게 이르시되 누구든지 나를 따라오려거든 자기를 부인하고 자기 십자가를 지고 나를 따를 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples
Whoever wants to be my disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 나의 제자가 되고자 하는 사람은
